rows.label: qst701007_msg0001
rows.name:
This should be enough. I'll
get to work right away.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0002
rows.name: Oh, so it's finally starting.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0003
rows.name:
Fred, it might get noisy
for a while, but...

rows.label: qst701007_msg0004
rows.name:
Don't worry about it. It's a
welcome development for us
too. Just focus on your work.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0005
rows.name:
In the meantime, I'll put up
a notice that we're closed.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0006
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0007
rows.name: I'll help too, Dad!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0008
rows.name:
...The opening and closing
is fine. It's done.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0009
rows.name: Yay! It's perfect!!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0010
rows.name: Oh, so this is our shelter.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0011
rows.name:
Amazing, mo! What a magnificent
door, mo! It doesn't look like
it'll break easily, mo.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0012
rows.name:
Would you like to try hitting it?
It's made to be incredibly sturdy!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0013
rows.name: I can hit it, mo? How hard, mo?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0014
rows.name: Hey, stop it! It's not an instrument.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0015
rows.name: What's wrong? Are you a little tired?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0016
rows.name: No, I'm just a little overwhelmed.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0017
rows.name:
In reality, there are more things that don't
go well than things that do, right? I thought
it was normal not to hope for much.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0018
rows.name:
But... it's okay to hope, isn't it?
If you act, something will remain.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0019
rows.name:
No matter how difficult the situation,
they open a path for themselves. There are
many in Iira with that kind of spirit.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0020
rows.name:
Well, how should I put it... it's not that
we want to put everything on your shoulders.
We wanted to tell you that we're here too.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0021
rows.name:
Even Morumo and the others aren't
just being protected, mo. We talked
about showing that spirit, mo.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0022
rows.name:
It would be hard to fight while worrying
about what's behind you. This shelter
is for that purpose as well.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0023
rows.name:
Um... about that, Zain-sama wants
to discuss the next shelter.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0024
rows.name: Huh? Isn't that a bit too soon?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0025
rows.name:
But, we have to do it now,
mo. We also need to collect
a lot of money, mo.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0026
rows.name: There's so much to do!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0027
rows.name: Shin, Kasumi, ...can I have a word?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0028
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0029
rows.name:
For example, okay? I don't
know if we can do it, but...

rows.label: qst701007_msg0030
rows.name:
After this war is over, what do
you think about building a house?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0032
rows.name:
You see, like Shin and Kasumi did for me,
I've been wanting to help someone, but I
haven't been able to imagine what exactly.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0033
rows.name:
But, I thought maybe it could
be building a home for the war
orphans to return to...

rows.label: qst701007_msg0034
rows.name: ...Is that strange?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0035
rows.name:
Not at all! That sounds
like so much fun.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0036
rows.name:
Yeah, why not. It would be
tough to support them, but...

rows.label: qst701007_msg0037
rows.name:
That's the thing. Building a house alone costs
money, and to live with a large number of
people, we need to think about finances.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0038
rows.name:
But, having a goal like
that would make Laura more
lively, wouldn't it?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0039
rows.name:
I thought so too! We'll become a big
family all at once, Laura-sama!

rows.label: qst701007_msg0040
rows.name:
A big family, huh? When you
put it like that, it makes
me a little restless.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0041
rows.name:
...Thank you both for
listening without laughing.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0042
rows.name:
We wouldn't laugh. It's a dream
you've found, isn't it, Laura?

rows.label: qst701007_msg0043
rows.name:
When things calm down, why
don't you talk to Adel-sama?
I'm sure he'll help you.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0044
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.

rows.label: qst701007_msg0045
rows.name:
For that to happen... we
absolutely have to protect Iira.
